textBox.richText: Happy International Women’s Day! In honor of today, which I only happened to stumble upon thanks to the work of the International Museum of Women, I directed my research towards collecting online resources for women’s issues and women’s history. For now, they are not formatted attractively, and their descriptions are not my own, but they are listed on the page for Links - Human Rights and Women. I chose this page because I believe women’s history essentially to be a history of the struggle for human rights.
